verbs.description: Trump [V: was] meeting in the Oval Office with Kim 's envoy , Kim Yong Chol , a former spy chief and currently the country 's top nuclear negotiator .
[ARG0: Trump] was [V: meeting] [ARGM-LOC: in the Oval Office] [ARG1: with Kim 's envoy , Kim Yong Chol , a former spy chief and currently the country 's top nuclear negotiator] .
